name: Empty Heart (Demo)
description:
A demo Action Puzzle game where you instruct your student how to face each obstacle and threat. Your student only has so many actions and the wrong combination of instructions could be their end. Think carefully of which actions to use in each challenge as each path has its dangers. Fix your past and give the best life to your son.

This game is still under development and might contain some bugs. The feedback from this game will be used to craft the final full game. Hope you enjoy the game!
